boardgame.name: Slide 5
boardgame.description: Players arrange their cards on the playing surface building _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;hills._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; Once a hill gets five cards high, the sixth card will cause an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Avalanche_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; and that player must take all of the cards in the row, leaving the sixth card to start a new hill. This is the re-themed version of 6 Nimmt!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I will ship via whatever method you prefer. International buyers please note... shipping overseas is EXPENSIVE.
